subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “scar; mark”
: {{rfe|zh|inline=yes}}
; “itchy”
: {{der|zh|qfa-tak}} substrate word. Compare {{cog|za|haenz||to itch}}, {{m|za|humz||to itch}}, {{cog|lic|kom||to itch}}.
